title: Beast Within 3: Oceans Unleashed
description: The magic and mystery of the oceans has ever intrigued man. So much so that most forget just how dangerous and predatory the oceans can be. Here are sixteen stories about the denizens of the oceans that most know nothing of... and those who do, learn their lesson the hard way. Come read the stories of the Beast Within from an aquatic point of view. These are the tales of the Oceans Unleashed. Featuring stories by Rosemary Jones, Pete Kempshall, Michael West, Jennifer Pelland, Josh Reynolds, and Wendy Wagner.
author: Jennifer Brozek
